etymology.description: Depicts a building used as an official's residence or office -> official
etymology.interpretation: The character 官(官) (guān, "official") originally depicted the concept of an official by representing a building associated with government officials. This pictogram conveyed the idea of someone holding an official position within such a building.

examples.chinese: 他勤奋学习(他勤奮學習)，成功走上官途(成功走上官途)。
examples.pinyin: Tā qínfèn xuéxí, chénggōng zǒu shàng guān tú.
examples.english: He studied diligently and eventually embarked on an official career.

examples.chinese: 朝廷任命新官(朝廷任命新官)，治理国家(治理國家)。
examples.pinyin: Cháotíng rènmìng xīn guān, zhìlǐ guójiā.
examples.english: The imperial court appointed a new official to govern the nation.
